title: Presentation accepted at the IAB Workshop on IP Address Geolocation
description: Our work 'Rethinking Geolocalization on the Internet' has been accepted for presentation at the IAB Workshop on IP Address Geolocation this December.

title: Paper accepted to ACM HotNets 2025
description: Our paper 'Rethinking Geolocalization on the Internet' has been accepted and will be presented at HotNets 2025.
